div1.head: for Dr B's Criticism

transpose.ab: (for those at all interested in it, or caring to pick it out, and for my own satisfaction.)

div1.ab: for Dr B's Criticism as far as it may be stated

x The purpose objectof Specimen Days those was to combine & weave for those who were interested in them at or cared & weave for them it & for my in one pattern variouscertain variegated threads record-threads of my personal life experience early years, young manhood in New York City and Brooklyn the Sec with what I had seen and of the Secession War 1861-'5. hospital scenes and interiors. of the Secession War of 1861-'5.—certain jottings of

Abrah the actual rank and file from all the States tha—notes an afterward for four or five years, notes and jottings of simple out-door rural Nature, as playing upon the emotions of a convalescent, a half-paralytic and played upon in return—some
of my reflections in the mean time, on literary characters especially Carlyle
—with a "Collect" of various pieces, comments on the my time and spirit of the time, especially as in "Democratic Vistas")

all scooped and swept in together, indeed (like fish in the result of hauling a fish‑seine)—some of the parts and pieces elaborated, and stated as I am content to have them—but a great deal of the book crude notes and diary‑jottings, personal and perhaps trivial—my purpose being (I suppose) to give some genuine glints and glances into a my actual life-happenings
